name: Taste of victory
description:
An RTS that blends elements of MOBA and RPG, with a focus on action. Your soldiers will be the cornerstone of your economy. If you want to acquire resources to increase or improve your army, you'll have to conquer.

Current Features:

  • Online multiplayer up to 4 players.

  • Player vs AI.

  • You can recruit soldiers.

  • You can command an army.

  • The economy system is based on the conquest of strategic points.
